about_the_game:
Hugh, a calm and collected boy, and Amity, a bright and cheerful girl, graduate from secondary school and enter a magick school.

Having lived in a non-magick world, the two are bewildered but intend to learn magick and study to become full-fledged sorcerers...

The older sorcerers with strong habits have their own agendas, and their agendas overlap and become a swell that engulfs the sorcerer world.

===

Players control Hugh or Amity, who are enrolled in a magic school, and aim for great heights as a sorcerer while befriending teachers, seniors, and classmates.

The main game stage is a competition against other characters, and the stage is cleared when someone defeats the boss at the top of the map.

The player gains Mana from the land on the map to strengthen the attributes of fire, water, earth, and wind, while defeating monsters to join their ranks.

Items obtained during movement and exploration can be used to battle monsters and strengthen spirits.

By using items effectively, it is important to strengthen players efficiently and take on bosses before other characters.

Play through the game stages and grow little by little to become the strongest magician.

short_description: Card Board RPG like "Soulmaster". The story of a boy and a girl newly enrolled in a magick school, who get involved in and confront incidents that occur in the world of sorcerers. With the help of the spirits of the four elements and mana, they fight monsters and the same sorcerers and grow up.
